title: Liz Truss: Britain needs an election to clear away the Brexit-blocked Parliament
text:
Britain needs a general election because MPs are refusing to vote for a Brexit deal, Cabinet minister Liz Truss says today.

The International Trade Secretary told today's Chopper's Brexit Podcast - which you can listen to easily on the player above - "We could have had an election by now, we could have cleared this issue up, we could have got a decisive Parliament and the Labour Party have stopped that happening.

"If Parliament is not prepared to vote for the Brexit deal the Prime Minister has secured, of course we need to have an election.

"The Prime Minister is delivering Brexit to a rapid pace. I think the British public can see that; they can see that it’s Parliament that have taken the...
description: Britain needs a general election because MPs are refusing to vote for a Brexit deal, Cabinet minister Liz Truss says today.
